info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 09 at 10:28PM EST until January 13 at 1:56AM EST by NWS Blacksburg
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in North Carolina...Virginia... Dan River Near Wentworth affecting Rockingham County. Dan River at Dan River at Paces affecting Halifax County. ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Virginia...North Carolina... Dan River near Danville affecting Pittsylvania, Caswell, and Rockingham Counties, as well as the City of Danville. Dan River at South Boston affecting Halifax County. For the Dan River...including Wentworth, STP near Danville, Dan River at Paces, South Boston...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM LATE TONIGHT TO EARLY SATURDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Dan River at South Boston. * WHEN...From late tonight to early Saturday morning. * IMPACTS...At 27.0 feet, Water approaches route 501. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:00 PM EST Tuesday the stage was 16.4 feet. - Bankfull stage is 18.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late tonight to a crest of 26.8 feet by Thursday evening. It will then fall below flood stage early Friday afternoon. - Flood stage is 22.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued Wednesday morning at 1030 AM EST.
